answers.answer: I am a type 1 diabetic and got it with the onset of my first pregnancy. The perinatolgists are hard.core doctors who don't mess around, I know. They act like u are trying to harm ur baby. But ur dr is being rude! If u are doing everything u can and ur sugars are in control complications are less likely. But with any pregnancy things can happen. Perfectly healthy mothers have stillborns. It was recommend I terminate my first one bc my a1c Was 14.3 and my blood sugars were 600+. Luckily he came out with no problems. Now my a1c is 6.2 and they still tell me my sugars arent ideal....what the heck?? Never good enough! Vent away! I totally understand and its hard not to be down on yourself when u are doing ur best and they still knock u to the ground...

I'm type 2 diabetic and currently 34wks pg. My Dr's have been strict with me but not mean. They switched me from metformin 1000mg 2x day to glyburide 2.5 2x a day. My a1c went from 6.8 to 5.1. I am very strict on my diet and try to never let my sugars get over 120 ( 2hrs after meal) n 90 fasting. My Dr's biggest concern is big baby ( measuring 4lbs at 30wks) and baby's sugar dropping once cord is cut. My perinatal specialist is recommending induction between 37-38wks n ob wants to wait till 38-39 but said it'll depend on baby's size and how my body n sugars are doing. Don't let the Dr's steal ur joy. Is it gonna be hard n frustrating, um most definitely, but u can do this..
Thanks ladies. Sometimes you just need to connect with someone who is going through the same things

I say drs in cases like this should be concern about health of you and the bby but not to the point of being rude. Strict yes. Im Type 2 and 8 weeks. None of my drs are rude or mean i love them. If they make you feel uncomfortable ask about other ppl friendly drs you may want to switch. Good luck

I'm also type 1 and have been for about 3 years. Sometimes I'm also over shooting my insulin and then having to eat more when I'm low just cause I'm paranoid about being high about and don't wanna run high.It's a battle and constant worry.I also am starting to feel pressure from the doctors to induce at 32 weeks and induced fine with that but induced really worried about them pushing a c section and i do not want a c section. I'm just fearful they will push one since I'm diabetic. Dumb.
